des: "Pumpkin lovers, you've got to try this! Goes great on pancakes and French toast, or dip a fresh popover in it. It's got a warm spicy taste, perfect for fall and winter! Heat it up and pour a little over vanilla ice cream!"
ins: Stir the honey, sweetened condensed milk, canned pumpkin, butter, brewed coffee, nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, maple syrup, half-and-half, and hot water together in a saucepan over low heat; simmer, stirring frequently, until the mixture is fragrant and hot, about 20 minutes. Serve warm or hot.
